text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] be a [mathjaxinline]m\times n[/mathjaxinline] matrix. A vector [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline] is in the span of the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] if and only the equation [mathjaxinline]Ax = v[/mathjaxinline] has:

optioninput.options: ('no solutions','exactly one solution','at least one solution','more than one solution')

font.p: The vector [mathjaxinline]v[/mathjaxinline] is in the span of the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] if there is at least one way to write it as a linear combination of the columns of [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline], or in other words if there is at least one [mathjaxinline]x[/mathjaxinline] which satisfies [mathjaxinline]Ax = v[/mathjaxinline].
